name: study-v
description: Malaysian Chinese School Video Learning Platform

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend/chinese-learning-platform && pnpm run preview"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend/chinese-learning-platform && pnpm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/chinese-learning-platform && pnpm install --prefer-offline
